changeSet.author: Pengap
changeSet.comment: 组件包信息表新增widget_body字段，修改字段描述
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE `${table.prefix}widget_package` ADD COLUMN `widget_body` json NULL COMMENT '组件包扩展信息' AFTER `release_type`, MODIFY COLUMN `is_template` tinyint(1) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '是否模版(0:否,1:是)' AFTER `release_id`, MODIFY COLUMN `is_enabled` tinyint(1) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 COMMENT '是否启用，只针对全局小组件(0:未启用,1:启用)' AFTER `is_template`;
